recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.ingredients: Spaghetti, Eggs, Parmesan, Pancetta, Black Pepper
instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water.
Cook pancetta in a pan until crisp.
Beat eggs and mix with grated Parmesan.
Combine hot pasta with pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve with extra cheese and pepper.
comments: Make sure the pasta is hot enough to cook the eggs.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, Curry Powder, Onion, Garlic, Tomato, Coconut Milk
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic until soft.
Add chicken and curry powder, cook until browned.
Add chopped tomatoes and simmer.
Pour in coconut milk and cook until thickened.
Serve with rice or naan.
comments: Add chili if you like it spicy.

recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.ingredients: Flour, Eggs, Milk, Sugar, Baking Powder
instructions: Whisk together all ingredients in a bowl.
Heat a non-stick pan and pour batter.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip.
Cook until both sides are golden.
Serve with syrup or fruit.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon
recipes.ingredients: Salmon, Lemon, Olive Oil, Dill, Garlic
instructions: Marinate salmon with olive oil, garlic, and dill.
Preheat grill to high heat.
Grill salmon skin-side down for 5–6 minutes.
Flip and grill for 2–3 more minutes.
Serve with lemon wedges.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.ingredients: Beef, Mushrooms, Onions, Sour Cream, Butter, Flour
instructions: Sear beef strips in a pan, set aside.
Sauté mushrooms and onions in butter.
Sprinkle flour and cook briefly.
Add beef back, stir in sour cream.
Simmer until thick and creamy.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
recipes.ingredients: Tomatoes, Cucumbers, Feta Cheese, Olives, Red Onion, Olive Oil
instructions: Chop tomatoes, cucumbers, and red onions.
Add olives and crumbled feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Sprinkle with oregano and toss gently.
Serve chilled.
